price: Bagarariji! Ivyo bihano mubihawe kuko mwararikiwe ukwemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, mugaheza mukeza n’ivyo mugira vyose ku bwayo, mukagarariza; n’iyo Ibangikanijwe n’ikindi kintu, mwaraheza mukacemera mukagikurikira. Ingingo yose rero ikwiye kwubahirizwa, ni iy’Imana Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere, Nyenubukuru.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُۥ كَفَرۡتُمۡ وَإِن يُشۡرَكۡ بِهِۦ تُؤۡمِنُواْۚ فَٱلۡحُكۡمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡعَلِيِّ ٱلۡكَبِيرِ

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bi-annahu idhā duʿiya al-lahu waḥdahu kafartum wa-in yush'rak bihi tu'minū fal-ḥuk'mu lillahi al-ʿaliyi al-kabīri
